posts.post_content:
Some of you know that I have been putting together a unique run of Ganley for years. I'm looking to add anything I don't have and I may not even know what that is yet.  I have all backs, missing color, ghost print, name at top and bottom, stamped back, hand trimmed during the origin period, color shift and different variants of color.  I need just a couple more to fill out my 20 sheet holder so think out of the box.  Let me see your Ganley's!
Thanks!
Eric

Hi Eric, I don't know how far outside the box you want to go but there
are two different plate scratches that I know of that are found on Ganley.

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=338415&d=1545627342[/IMG]
Not sure if higher grade is of interest, but I have psa 6s with piedmont and sovereign backs.  Id let go of one.  Thanks Joey

[quote name="Roulette44" post=1839843]Not sure if higher grade is of interest, but I have psa 6s with piedmont and sovereign backs.  Id let go of one.  Thanks Joey[/QUOTE]

Thank you for the offer Joey!  I have a few in that range.  Looks like I'm after a plate scratch now.  Please check your backs and let me know.
